thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com | 4 of 32
thread.title: Judy

author: Judy
title: Judy
text:
I had a laser hair removal treatment with Jessica yesterday. She was super nice and efficient. I arrived 15 min early and she brought me right back. She also seemed very thorough.
My only complaint was a time when a different nurse brought me in and had a new nurse training. I was not even introduced to the new nurse nor was I told that she'd be observing. Then, mid case, the new nurse was suddenly practicing on me. Again, not a word from the regular nurse. I'm fine w/someone learning on me and observing, but I feel it's very professional to ALWAYS tell a patient what's going on. At least say, "this is Jane Doe, our new nurse, and she'll be watching as well as maybe participating if that's ok w/you."
